scripts.version: builder run clean && builder run build && echo BRC git add -A dist
scripts.build-dist: builder run clean-dist && builder run build-dist-min && builder run build-dist-dev
scripts.build-lib: builder run clean-lib && echo BRC babel --stage 0 src -d lib
scripts.clean: builder run clean-lib && builder run clean-dist
scripts.build: builder run build-lib && builder run build-dist
scripts.lint: builder run lint-server && builder run lint-client && builder run lint-client-test
scripts.test-frontend: echo BRC node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.test-frontend-ci: echo BRC node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --browsers PhantomJS,Firefox karma.conf.coverage.js
scripts.test-frontend-cov: echo BRC node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.coverage.js
scripts.test-frontend-dev: echo BRC node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.dev.js
scripts.test: builder run test-frontend && builder run test-backend
scripts.test-ci: builder run test-frontend-ci && builder run test-backend
scripts.test-cov: builder run test-frontend-cov && builder run test-backend
scripts.test-dev: builder run test-frontend-dev && builder run test-backend
scripts.check: builder run lint && builder run test
scripts.check-ci: builder run lint && builder run test-ci
scripts.check-cov: builder run lint && builder run test-cov
scripts.check-dev: builder run lint && builder run test-dev
